unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Gotta say, it's a lifesaver, especially here in Maharashtra. Last year's drought almost wiped out my jowar crop. Thankfully, Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana came through. Still, the paperwork is a pain! Heard Ramesh from Kerala had a tough time claiming after the Onam floods. Hopefully, things improve soon. Need a smoother process, like ordering biryani online, ya! Rs. 2000/acre ain't cheap either.
normalised: Crop insurance, eh? Gotta say, it is a lifesaver, especially here in Maharashtra. Last year's drought almost wiped out my jowar crop. Thankfully, Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana came through. Still, the paperwork is a pain! Heard Ramesh from Kerala had a tough time claiming after the Onam floods. Hopefully, things improve soon. Need a smoother process, like ordering biryani online, ya! Rupee two thousand per acre ain't cheap either.
